theme: South Australian landscapes, towns, and coastal regions — including vineyards, rolling agricultural hills, historic stone farmhouses, 19th-century Lutheran churches, bluestone cottages, rugged coastlines, windswept beaches, estuaries, river gums, vineyard cellars, wildlife such as kangaroos and blue fairy wrens, cottage gardens, native flowers, olive groves, sheep paddocks, dusty backroads, outback colours, quaint main streets, markets, cafes, and winery views — all evoking a sense of place, sunlight, texture, and everyday beauty unique to regional South Australia.
compositions: Framed through a doorway or window
Rule of thirds with strong foreground interest
